CustomField.description: Full Mask: all credit card number characters are masked **************** Last4: all credit card number characters are masked but the last 4 characters ************1234 First6andLast4: all credit card number characters are masked by the first 6 and the last 4 characters 123456******1234
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Full Mask: all credit card number characters are masked Last4: all credit card number characters are masked but the last 4 characters First6andLast4: all credit card number characters are masked by the first 6 and the last 4 characters
CustomField.label: MaskType
